module.hook: if( !defined( 'CMM_PATH' ) ){ // if cmModules is not yet loaded $config = $context->config->getAll( 'module.resource_library_cmmodules.path', TRUE ); // get include path from config $path = preg_replace( "@/+$@si", "", trim( $config->get( 'path' ) ) ).'/'; // sanitize include path if( !@include_once $path.'autoload.php5' ) // loading autoloader script failed die( 'Library "cmModules" could not been found in path "'.$path.'".' ); // quit fataly since this is essential }
